thread.title: BRIEF-Recon Wenyuan Cable To Invest In Indonesia's Real Estate And Energy Business

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Recon Wenyuan Cable To Invest In Indonesia's Real Estate And Energy Business

organizations.name: reuters) - recon wenyuan cable co ltd

text:
March 4 (Reuters) - Recon Wenyuan Cable Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO INVEST IN INDONESIAâ€™S PT.WIJAYA KARYA REALTY FOR 15 PERCENT STAKE IN WIKA REALTY, TO BUY 70 PERCENT STAKE IN PT.WIJAYA KARYA INDUSTRI ENERGI VIA SHARE ISSUE
* SAYS SHARE TRADE REMAINS SUSPENDED, AIMS TO RESUME TRADING ON APRIL 1 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2oGZQAN Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
